meanings.definition: A small, portable disc-shaped storage medium for digital audio data.
meanings.sent1: I bought a minidisc to listen to music on the go.
meanings.sent2: The minidisc held all my favorite songs in a compact form.
meanings.sent3: My friend thought my minidisc was a tiny frisbee!
meanings.sent4: The minidisc was like a magical music box in my pocket.
meanings.sent5: The shiny minidisc gleamed under the sunlight.

meanings.definition: To record or store data on a minidisc.
meanings.sent1: I will minidisc my voice memo for safekeeping.
meanings.sent2: She minidiscs her lectures for future reference.
meanings.sent3: Don't forget to minidisc your favorite song before it's gone!
meanings.sent4: His memories were minidisc-ed in the digital archive.
meanings.sent5: The artist decided to minidisc his latest creation for posterity.

meanings.definition: A device used to play minidiscs.
meanings.sent1: The minidisc player was compact and easy to carry around.
meanings.sent2: She inserted the minidisc into the player and pressed play.
meanings.sent3: The cat mistook the minidisc player for a strange toy.
meanings.sent4: The minidisc player whispered melodies into the room.
meanings.sent5: With the minidisc player, he could enjoy music anywhere he went.
